title: Places to Know
content: the promised land God directed Lehi’s family and the Jaredites to
a city of wicked people who would not listen to Alma the Younger and Amulek
a city where wicked people built a tower so they could climb to heaven
a city near Jerusalem where Jesus Christ was born
the place Lehi’s family camped after traveling in the wilderness for eight years. From here they traveled to the promised land.
the place Jesus Christ came to when he visited the Nephites
the place where Moroni buried the gold plates and Joseph Smith later uncovered them
the land the Nephites gave the people of Ammon
the city where Lehi prophesied to the wicked and the place where Jesus Christ taught and was crucified
the city that Nephi and his people built after they left Laman and Lemuel and their followers
any land God leads his chosen people to. He led Lehi’s family and the Jaredites to a promised land.
the land where Alma the Younger established the Church. It became the new home of the righteous people who left Ammonihah.
the place where Alma baptized the converted Nephites who had left King Noah
a major Nephite city that was the government and Church center. King Mosiah and King Benjamin lived here. The city was burned at Jesus’ death.
